H0.text: Which African country's flag is red with a green star in the centre. Guinea

H1.text: Which African country's flag is red with a green star in the centre. Mali

H2.text: Which African country's flag is red with a green star in the centre. Senegal

H3.text: Which African country's flag is red with a green star in the centre. Maroc

A4.text: The flag of Morocco has a red field with a green pentagram in the centre.

A5.text: On 17 November 1915, Sultan Yusef signed a dahir introducing the current flag design.
